entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:27 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 09:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: ENE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
